title: Ancient Transformative Reading: Vervaeke, Orthodoxy, Tim Keller,
description:
John Vervaeke is doing a lot of side interviews that help us see where his project is going. Other YouTubers are also working his stuff and Pageau's stuff. We'll see how Vervaeke's observations line up with Orthodoxy in terms of Lectio Divina reading. 

Vervaeke clip 1 https://youtu.be/V4UydKAamu0
Mystagogy and Liturgy https://youtu.be/RMsznl_NhhE
Vervaeke and Hall on Rebel Wisdom https://youtu.be/awmqIySF2Gs
A Quality Existence https://youtu.be/EcRhI2i_qYM
Tim Keller Preaching https://www.amazon.com/Preaching-Communicating-Faith-Age-Skepticism-ebook/dp/B00OQSF8QS
Byrne Power Texture https://youtu.be/xUNKcU_4LP8
SBC Losses https://twitter.com/PaulVanderKlay/status/1138119886364741632
